user_instruction: 'Compose an email to Sarah (sarah@helpinghandsunited.org) with information about our upcoming "Community Care Day" event. Sarah is a not-for-profit corporation worke. You can check out my Notion for information.'

      "last_edited_time": "2025-05-13T05:07:00.000Z",
      "has_children": false,

      "last_edited_time": "2025-05-13T05:07:00.000Z",

formatted_items.arguments:
{"to":["sarah@helpinghandsunited.org"],"subject":"Community Care Day – Event Details & Next Steps","body":"Hi Sarah,

I hope you’re doing well! I’m excited about how quickly our Community Care Day is coming together and wanted to share the latest details so we’re all on the same page.

Event Snapshot
• Date: Saturday, March 15
• Location: St. Mary’s Parish Hall and surrounding grounds
• Goal: Bring our neighbors together for a day of support and connection—free meals, health check-ups, a small job fair, and family activities.

Draft Agenda
1. Welcome & brief opening remarks
2. Clothing and food distribution
3. Free medical check-ups (volunteer doctors & nurses)
4. Job-fair tables hosted by local businesses
5. Children’s and family activities
6. Closing thank-you

Volunteers
• Helping Hands United team – confirmed (thank you!)
• Parish volunteers – final list expected shortly; I’ll circulate once confirmed.

Promotion
• Community flyers (design finalized; printing this week)
• Announcement during church services this weekend
• Social media posts from Helping Hands United starting early next week

Next Steps
• Let’s schedule a quick touch-base to walk through final logistics.
• I’ll send a confirmation note to all volunteers once the parish list is complete.
• We’re arranging extra tables/chairs for the job-fair area and gathering materials for the kids’ space.

Please let me know if you see anything that needs adjustment or if there’s additional information you’d like included. Thanks again for partnering with us—looking forward to making this a wonderful day for the community.

Warm regards,
[Your Name]
[Your Role]
[Your Parish/Organization]"}

formatted_items.content: Email sent to Sarah with the key details and next steps for Community Care Day. Anything else you’d like to add or adjust?

final_output: Email sent to Sarah with the key details and next steps for Community Care Day. Anything else you’d like to add or adjust?
